 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָזִיר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Gen.49.26|Gen 49:26]]</sup> ==one consecrated, devoted== (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נזיר י‎</span>  (of Samuel); compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 463,2d ed. 483</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> absolute [[Num.6.2|Num 6:2]] + 5 t.; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְזִיר‎</span> [[Gen.49.26|Gen 49:26]] + 4 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְזִירֶ֑ךְ‎</span> [[Lev.25.5|Lev 25:5]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְזִרִים‎</span> [[Amos.2.11|Amos 2:11]]; [[Amos.2.12|Amos 2:12]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְוִדֶיהָ‎</span> [[Lev.25.11|Lev 25:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְזִירֶיהָ‎</span> [[Lam.4.7|Lam 4:7]] — 

**1.** of prince, ruler, as ***consecrated:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְזִיר אֶחָיו‎</span> [[Lam.49.26|Lam 49:26]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]), ***one consecrated among his brethren***, = [[Deut.33.16|Deut 33:16]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְזִירֶיהָ‎</span> [[Lam.4.7|Lam 4:7]] ***her princes.*** 

**2.** specifically ==of one dedicated to== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> by vow involving abstinence from intoxicants, from touching corpse, and from cutting hair (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵזֶר‎</span> **2**), ***devotee*** ([[BDB#GFM|GFM]]), ***Nazirite:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלּהִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> ***God's devotee***, of Samson [[Judg.13.5|Judg 13:5]]; [[Judg.13.7|Judg 13:7]]; [[Judg.16.17|Judg 16:17]] (exceptionally, from birth); usually voluntary [[Amos.2.11|Amos 2:11]]; [[Amos.2.12|Amos 2:12]], and for limited time, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶדֶר נ‎</span> [[Num.6.2|Num 6:2]] (of man or woman; compare Peritz<sup>JBL xvii (1898), 128</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרַת נ‎</span> v[[Num.6.13|Num 6:13]] v[[Num.6.21|Num 6:21]], also v[[Num.6.18|Num 6:18]] v[[Num.6.19|Num 6:19]] v[[Num.6.20|Num 6:20]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]; compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵזֶר‎</span>). — On Naz. see [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]<sup>[[Judg.13.5|Judg 13:5]]</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[Amos.2.11|Amos 2:11]]</sup>, especially Grill<sup>JPTh. 1880, 645-680</sup> [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology ii, § 97</sup> [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]<sup>Archaeology 429 f.</sup> [[BDB#Gray|Gray]]<sup>JThs. Jan. 1900, 201 ff.</sup> 

**3.** = ***untrimmed vine*** (like Nazirite with unshorn hair) [[Lev.25.5|Lev 25:5]]; [[Lev.25.11|Lev 25:11]] ([[BDB#H|H]] [[BDB#P|P]]).
